title: Client randomly crashed
body: My friend had low priority queue as his internet had crashed and we were in his last game. We wait 20 minutes and then get into champ select and then the client just decided to close randomly. According to my friends it just said i had disconnected from chat so i tried reopening but it just took me to homepage. My friend has to wait another 20 minutes for no reason and I got a dodge because the OLD client crashed. If it was the beta client i would understand but this is the old one and it's just dumb that it crashes this way.

replies.body:
It sounds like either your connection could be unstable so it's disconnecting from champion select, or you have a third party like play.tv running.  I recommend removing any third parties that interact with league just in case as they've been known to crash.  

Otherwise, run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help fix this up.  Test it out in a custom game as well to prevent any further penalties.  It does suck that ya'll got back to back waiting periods, and while we can't remove them I hope those steps can help prevent future occurrences.  Let me know if you have any questions!
